welcome_message_body: Welcome to Halifax, where the charming waterfront, rich maritime history, and friendly locals await you. Explore our vibrant city and enjoy all it has to offer!

restaurants.name: Ricci's Place
restaurants.description: Ricci's Place is a italian restaurant located in Halifax.

restaurants.name: Nando's
restaurants.description: Nando's is a portuguese restaurant located in Halifax.

restaurants.name: Engine Room Café & Kitchen
restaurants.description: Engine Room Café & Kitchen is a deli located in Halifax.
restaurants.address: F Mill, Dean Clough, Halifax, HX3 5AJ

restaurants.name: La Luna Cafe
restaurants.description: La Luna Cafe is a italian restaurant located in Halifax.

restaurants.name: KFC
restaurants.description: KFC is a fast food restaurant located in Halifax.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shearwater Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Shearwater Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminals and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Halifax International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
